Package edu.rice.starvote

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDiverter
    Interface for a controller module that diverts a ballot to one of two paths.
    IMotor
    Interface for a bidirectional variable speed motor controller.
    IPWMDriver
    Interface for a pulse width modulation (PWM) controller.
    IScanner
    Interface for a code scanner controller.
    ISpooler
    Interface for the ballot box paper feeder controller.
    IStatusUpdate
    Interface for ballot status updates to be sent from the paper feeder.
    IValidator
    Interface for code validator.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    Main entry point of program.
    DiverterPWM
    Diverter servo control using a generic IPWMDriver.
    DiverterPython Deprecated
    ExternalProcess
    Utility methods to spawn external processes and capture their output.
    GPIOListener
    Handles hardware interrupts for a GPIO input pin.
    GPIOManager
    Utility class to supply a singleton Pi4J GpioController.
    JarResource
    Utility class that simplifies access to resource files when the application is packaged in a JAR.
    Monitor
    Main program loop that detects when paper has been inserted into the feed tray and starts the paper feeder.
    PaperSpooler
    Reference implementation of ballot box paper feeder controller.
    PinMap
    This class provides a convenience method to map BCM pin numbers to Pi4J pins.
    PrinterMotor
    Reference implementation of the feed motor controller, driving the main motor in an HP 1010 printer.
    PWMBlaster
    Implementation of PWM controller using pi-blaster.
    PWMPython Deprecated
    Scan
    Implementation of scanner controller that invokes an external C scan program.
    StatusContainer
    Holds a ballot status value.
    StatusServer
    Web server that supplies the current status of the ballot box.
    StatusWebSocket
    WebSocket handler class for status server.
    Tester
    Created by luej on 7/20/16.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BallotStatus
    Describes the state of the ballot box.
    DeviceStatus
    Describes the device hardware state.
